full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RANG GI BYA BA'I RIM PA BSKUL BA DANG BCAS PA YI GER BRIS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(RANG GI BYA BA'I RIM PA BSKUL BA DANG BCAS PA YI GER BRIS PA` SLOB DPON MKHAS PA CHEN PO DPAL MAR ME MDZAD YE SHES KYI ZHAL SNGA NAS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO CHEN PO DE NYID DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZ'A BA DGE SLONG DGE BA'I BLO GROS KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA,, ,,)
